string-array.name: itemlist
string-array.item: Tairunnessa Memorial Medical College and Hospital

resources.string:
Tairunnessa Memorial Medical College:
Tairunnessa Memorial Medical College is a private medical school in Bangladesh, established in 1995. It is an institution of the Tairunnessa Memorial Medical Centre. It was founded by Mohammad Shamsul Hoque, named after his mother, the late Tairunnessa, a social reformer. 

 Address: Konia (Targach), National University, Gazipur ar, gazipur. Or 1704 ঢাকা - ময়মনসিংহ মহাসড়ক Dhaka-Mymensigh Highway, Gazpur 1704 

 Hours:Open 24 hours 
 Phone: 01914-213134 
 Number of students: 700 
 Principal: Dr Abdul khaleq akond 
 Founded: 2002 
 Academic staff: 143 
 Academic affiliation: University of Dhaka

Sultan General Hospital
 
 Address: Second Floor, Dhaka - Mymensingh Hwy, 1704 

 Hours: Open 24 hours
 Phone: 01731-219390
